attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app is terrible everytime I got on it my phone would lag out and turn off I hate this app it makes my battery go to 1% within 5 minutes on the app when I start with over 50%. This app is just terrible in every way DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: my grandma died because of it✨
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app to support my NON-racist, NON-homophobic, NON-xenophobic, NON-sexist, NON-misogynistic, NON-idiot president, because ofc he’s not that😹😹, and as soon as i opened the app my grandma took my phone and looked through said app, she immediately died of heart failure. definitely would not recommend. rip grandma 👁👄👁

attributes.title: sex trafficking related
attributes.review: Do not login into this app, it automatically tracks and sends your ip address including you personal business towards the government. Trump is also racist and a rapist but i tried to find a better in everything but i just cant find one.

attributes.title: This is the WORST app I’ve ever seen
attributes.review: I came here to fine at least one reason why he should be president but I couldn’t even find one🤷🏽‍♀️ I don’t get why people want to vote for him when he’s a racist and rapist for all we know, all the people that vote for him MUST like the fact that he is.

attributes.title: glitches
attributes.review: this app glitches so bad, and every time i opened it it took me out. it wouldn’t allow me to go into other apps without those glitching out too. the music the app played constantly played even when i closed the app. absolutely terrible, DO NOT DWNLOAD

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app is disgusting, it mad my phone glitch and  it took forever to download. It does not give enough info on why I should vote him it the worst I have to get anew phone due to this app cause it made my phone glitch and stop working well the disrespect this app give is astronomical

attributes.title: IF I COULD RATE IT 0 STARS I WOULD
attributes.review:
immediately after i downloaded this app the only function that my phone had was to display a Trump 2020 flag and now i cannot use my
phone at all!! I am incredibly disappointed in our president and he will NOT be getting my vote due to this hacking monstrosity 😤. I AM WARNING YOU ALL DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD. THIS. APP.

attributes.title: ✨🧚horrifying🧚✨
attributes.review: when i opened this app the first thing i saw was a nude cheeto trying to look like more of a cheeto getting a spray tan, i’m blind now.~👄~ it’s was absolutely terrifying. a few hours later a few trump supporters came to my house telling me to rate 5 stars on this app, ofc i defeated them with my awesome super ninja skills.😎SCORE!

attributes.title: Most horrible app of the year 😔
attributes.review: This app has lots of bugs now my phone doesn’t work properly because of this app. This app is also unorganized and there is no use of this app, what’s the point. Also they always try to bribe me with things like yo chillax.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so badly. It completely shut down to the point where I had to get my whole phone reset. The orange king probably made the whole app glitch out so everyone’s oh know would have to restart there phones. Trump 2020 ✨ in a grave 😻
